title: From Othering to Belonging
description: We speak with john a. powell, director of the Othering & Belonging Institute, about racial justice, well-being, and widening our circles of human connection and concern.
itunes:title: From Othering to Belonging
itunes:subtitle: We speak with john a. powell, director of the Othering & Belonging Institute, about racial justice, well-being, and widening our circles of human connection and concern.
itunes:author: Dacher Keltner & Allison Briscoe-Smith
itunes:summary: We speak with john a. powell, director of the Othering & Belonging Institute, about racial justice, well-being, and widening our circles of human connection and concern.
